TextBlock.Text: SENNETTI: Azolla, you told us to meet you here? You said there was news to discuss.
AZOLLA: Yes. Sennetti, Okalis, it seems… it seems that our friends on the <color=orange>Third Escape Pod</color> have perished.
OKALIS: What! Are you certain? I don’t understand how we could have learned this given our current situation.

NESIA: I spoke with Karenia, who was able to commune with the <color=purple>Bramble</color>. In doing that, she learned the third pod became ensnared in the vines, causing its passengers to suffocate.
AZOLLA: …I understand tensions are elevated in light of these events. I would suggest we take a moment to mourn, after which we will construct a memorial in their memory.
